text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
(Reflecting on the live performance...)

Ah...
For now...
As I thought...
(You're really focused... Good job.)

!
This choreography...!

(?
That was Tenka's part just now, right?)
Ehehe~

(Oh, I see.
So she's not only writing her own, but Tenka's parts too.)
Phew~

Amana, good job.
Looks like we've finished for now, so shall we take a break?

Ehehe, good job~
Sure, I'll get ready~

Alright, I'll get ready, so wait a moment.
What would you like to drink, Amana?

Huh! You don't have to go through so much trouble!
Producer-san must be tired too, right?
Haha, it's no problem.

I was just about to take a break myself.
Consider it as a side task.

Hmm...
Then, may I have a café au lait, please?
Sure, I'll make it a bit sweet.
Hmm... Thank you...!

...
Delicious~
Haha, I see.

...
Did you make any new discoveries?

You seemed to be taking notes diligently
while watching the videos.

Ah, yeah. I noticed a few places where
Tenka's movements were a bit small.

Because of that, it seems like she's not able
to express what she wants to.

I plan to practice more and
correct them properly next time.

I see.
You're able to analyze it accurately. Well done.
Ehehe, thank you.

Also, you wrote various things about Tenka's part, right?
Did you discover anything about Tenka as well?

Of course!
Let's see~

Maybe it's faster if you see them yourself?
There are so many.
Sure thing.

Oh, is it okay?
Then excuse me...

What... Your smile is cute...
Your steps have improved so much...

The final pose shows the results of your practice...
...Perfect...
Did you write down any points for improvement separately?
Nope! Just this!

It's called "Tenka-chan's Good Points Discovery Notebook"!
I always make it together with Amana's Reflection Notebook☆
